item.title: Warm Up Cafe @ Mackenzie Road
item.description: Along a row of shophouses along Mackenzie Road, a short walk from Little India MRT, Warm Up Cafe serves authentic Thai food at affordable prices. While the front of the cafe is modern and insta-worthy with the fancy lighting, it is at the back where you will find a large al fresco area. And with Thai music playing in the background in the back area, it completely exudes the hipster back alley bistros vibes in Bangkok.
